mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER,P_NAME,P_EMAIL,P_PRICE,P_END_DATE,P_OK,P_SEND_CONFIRM,P_CURRENTAMOUNT) VALUES (#{email},SEQ_P_NUM.NEXTVAL,(select count(*) from project where EMAIL = #{email})+1,#{name},#{email},0,SYSDATE,'F','F',0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE EMAIL = #{userId}

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM PROJECT WHERE P_PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode}

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM PROJECT WHERE EMAIL = #{userId} AND P_PROJECT_NUMBER = #{projectNum}
